content.value:
Tech companies: we're gonna need you to do countless hours of tests, exercises and interviews before we believe you're qualified for this role
You: ok cool I'll do that
Tech companies: you did great! You're hired
You: Oh excellent so I think we should do X
Tech companies: oh _no_
